Product Management

Summary
I have over 2 years of experience working in Software Industry both
as a Software Engineer as well as an Big Data Engineer. Currently,
I working as a startup cofounder, we build a platform for sport
connection. And working as a Software Developer Engineer in Citigo,
research and developing requirements from boss. 
From a small academic competition in my school, I had started to
learn to be a software engineer. I have some experience about
machine learning focus deep learning, NLP, and model prediction
and little computer vision. I wanna be a Data Scientist, while I keep
to learn more about machine learning, statistical, Data mining, ...
